Blog.post: i tripped the other day with my friend, honky. we day tripped at the park, in the grocery store, in osco, in the corner, and in my treehouse. we heard a lady tell her friend that she is allergic to polyester and that if she ever laid down on a bed with polyester sheets and went to sleep she'd never wake up. ha ha. honky also was willing to try some yoga poses from a yoga deck and did them all!!! first time she ever did yoga!!! at one point i was reading the directions on how to get into the pose and concentrating really hard on my reading then i looked up when i heard an OUCH honky looked like a pretzel! in total position! anyhoo, dr. octogon rocks! and this stuff is totally legal. and i am tired... and i have 3 kinds of buds to smoke!

sometimes i hear this song when i go outside to school, to my friend's house, to eat, to walk, to mind my own business. even if i havent heard it years its there. gg alin bite it you scum... Well you want me to kiss your ass Well bend over, buddy, here comes my foot I don't need your cry ass shit Temper's rising, take a fit Bite it you scum Bite it you scum Bite it you scum - Here I come Bite it you scum Well you want me to contribute All I got is blood for you All you want is more and more Gluttony, you pig you whore Bite it you scum - Here I come Bite it you scum - I want your cum Bite it you scum - Um, yum Bite it you scum One day when your end is near I'll be laughing at your fear When you're gone there'll be no one Who'll be fucking up my fun - No one Bite it you scum Bite it you scum - Here I come Bite it you scum - I'm never gonna run Bite it you scum Bite it you scum Bite it you scum Bite it you scum - Here I come Bite it you scum Bite it you scum Bite it, bite it, bite it, bite it Bite it, bite it, bite it, bite it Bite it, bite it, bite it you fucking scum Bite it you scum fucking sucking whore

I had a friend that burned bodies for a living. dead people. she is really wierd anyway, but she decided to take 5 hits of acid with about 9 other people, and all of them sat on a church bench to watch some chick be incenterated. i heard her lips bubbled and she was thrown staight up from the heat's power and there were mad flames violently shooting out of her eye sockets. lo and behold she was swept up into a urn and my pal had a new glow in her eye. i wondered why she never invited me. probably cause i smoked out in my friends new herse but puked cause i could still smell all the formaldehyde, but i was youger then. this same pal o mine also introduced me to a awesome movie called necromantic. i was talking to some guy last night. what a yapper! i have gone about 3 months without saying very much. I'd like to say that i said nothing, but i just said what i needed to say. i have always thought that talking was overrated and a step in the wrong direction. then another time after my brother died i only said three words for about three months: "i don't know." more on this later... tired of hearing myself
i bet i'll write a haiku soon.
i bet these songs are about the same girl. the girl from ipanema (asturd gilberto), atomic (blondie), and playgirl (ladytron)
i'd like to say that i woke up and faced inward today, but i didn't. i thought about food, my dog, and self pity. I'll do it right now.
, but i can only do it when music is playing. I lost my virginity to Mötley Crüe.

wednesday? i was thinking about making wednesday for yo momma jokes on my blog so here goes. send me some through the comments button, but thats all i want to hear from your stupid lives. yo mama is sooooooo stupid AAAANNNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDD! nasty, she thought that tuna helper was duche
i want to hear performance by tones on tail.
yo mama so stupid she took a ruler to bed to see how long she slept.
informal poll... when u masterbate, do u hump?

eskimo sharted the other day when i was alseep and wiped her ass with my wife beater. i didnt know and washed the wife beater with enviro friendly laundry detergent that never gets stains out. yo no se, yo no se, yo no se, por que por que. eskimo grosses me out alot. punker than you.
yo. i am in waco now. wish i was somewhere else already. hmmm... beale street or bourbon street would totaly suit me right now.
